channel.title: CVE Feed for EmailGPT -- EmailGPT
channel.description: The latest CVEs for EmailGPT -- EmailGPT

item.title: CVE-2024-5184|2024-06-06T13:12:29.208Z -- emailgpt -- emailgpt
item.description: The EmailGPT service contains a prompt injection vulnerability. The service uses an API service that allows a malicious user to inject a direct prompt and take over the service logic. Attackers can exploit the issue by forcing the AI service to leak the standard hard-coded system prompts and/or execute unwanted prompts. When engaging with EmailGPT by submitting a malicious prompt that requests harmful information, the system will respond by providing the requested data. This vulnerability can be exploited by any individual with access to the service.

item.title: CVE-2024-5184|2024-06-05T17:52:13.608Z -- emailgpt -- emailgpt
item.description: The EmailGPT service contains a prompt injection vulnerability. The service uses an API service that allows a malicious user to inject a direct prompt and take over the service logic. Attackers can exploit the issue by forcing the AI service to leak the standard hard-coded system prompts and/or execute unwanted prompts. When engaging with EmailGPT by submitting a malicious prompt that requests harmful information, the system will respond by providing the requested data. This vulnerability can be exploited by any individual with access to the service.
